hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_CONDITION.CREATOR, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_CONDITION.CREATE_TIME, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_CONDITION.MODIFIER, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_CONDITION.MODIFY_TIME, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_CONDITION.REC_VER, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_CONDITION.REC_STATUS, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_CONDITION.ORG_ID, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_CONDITION.PM_CODE, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_CONDITION.EOCC_ID, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_CONDITION.EOCC_EOGP_PM_CODE, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_CONDITION.EOCC_EOCP_PM_CODE, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_CONDITION.EOCC_NO, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_CONDITION.EOCC_LEFT_BRACKET, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_CONDITION.EOCC_COLUMN_CODE, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_CONDITION.EOCC_OPERATE, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_CONDITION.EOCC_VALUE, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_CONDITION.EOCC_RIGHT_BRACKET, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_CONDITION.EOCC_CONTROL_LOGIC, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_CONDITION.TIME_ZONE from EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_CONDITION EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_CONDITION where 1=1 <<and EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_CONDITION.EOCC_EOGP_PM_CODE = :eoccEogpPmCode>> <<and EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_CONDITION.EOCC_EOCP_PM_CODE = :eoccEocpPmCode>> <<and EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_CONDITION.ORG_ID = :orgId>> order by EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_CONDITION.eocc_no asc
